item.title: State Rep. Josh Williams to Newsmax: Ohio Has Day Care Fraud Claims, Too
item.description: Ohio State Rep. Josh Williams, R-Sylvania Township, told Newsmax on Thursday he wants an investigation into child care centers in his state.
